home.title: Cactoide - The RSVP site
home.description: Create and manage event RSVPs. No registration required, instant sharing.
home.subtitle: The Ultimate RSVP Platform
home.tagline: Create, share, and manage events with zero friction.
home.whyCactoideDescription: Like the cactus, great events bloom under any condition when managed with care. Cactoide(ae) helps you streamline RSVPs, simplify coordination, and keep every detail efficient‚Äîso your gatherings are resilient, vibrant, and unforgettable.
home.discoverPublicEventsDescription: See what others are planning and get inspired
home.instantEventCreationDescription: Create events in seconds with our streamlined form. No accounts, no waiting, just pure efficiency.
home.oneClickSharingDescription: Each event gets a unique, memorable URL. Share instantly via any platform or messaging app.
home.allInOneClarityDescription: No more scrolling through endless chats and reactions. See everyone's availability and responses neatly in one place.
home.noHassleNoSignUpsDescription: Skip registrations and endless forms. Unlike other event platforms, you create and share instantly ‚Äî no accounts, no barriers.
home.smartLimitsDescription: Choose between unlimited RSVPs or set a limited capacity. Perfect for any event size.
home.effortlessSimplicityDescription: Designed to be instantly clear and easy. No learning curve ‚Äî just open, create, and go.
home.step1Description: Fill out a simple form with event details. Choose between limited or unlimited capacity.
home.step2Description: Receive a random, memorable URL for your event. Perfect for sharing anywhere.
home.step3Description: People visit your link and join with just their name. No accounts needed.
home.ctaTitle: Ready to Create Your First Event?
home.ctaDescription: Join thousands of event organizers who trust Cactoide

create.title: Create Event - Cactoide
create.publicDescription: Public events are visible to everyone and can be discovered by others.
create.privateDescription: Private events are only visible to you and people you share the link with.
create.inviteOnlyDescription: Event is public but requires a special invite link to attend.

event.title: {eventName} - Cactoide
event.eventNotFoundDescription: The event you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.
event.guestsWillBeAddedAs: Guests will be added as "{name}'s Guest #1", "{name}'s Guest #2", etc.
event.inviteOnlyBannerSubtitle: You're viewing this event through a special invite link
event.noEventsYetDescription: You haven't created any events yet. Start by creating your first event!
event.deleteEventDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{eventName}"? This action cannot be undone and will remove all RSVPs.
event.inviteLinkExpiresAt: This link expires when the event starts: {time}

discover.title: Discover Events - Cactoide
discover.noPublicEventsDescription: There are no public events available at the moment. Be the first to create one!
discover.publicEventsDescription: Discover events created by the community
discover.noEventsFoundDescription: Try adjusting your search terms or browse all events
